subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: While we may get a chuckle at the expense of the former publicity machine named A-Rod, even his most hardened skeptics must admit that he has kept a promise of lowering his profile.
snippet: While we may get a chuckle at the expense of the former publicity machine named A-Rod, even his most hardened skeptics must admit that he has kept a promise of lowering his profile.
